mapper.insert: insert into STUDIO (S_PK, S_TITLE, M_PK_WRITER, S_PRICE, S_LOCATION, S_CATEGORY, S_MAXIMUM, S_CLASSSTART, S_CLASSEND, S_CONTENT, S_COMMENT) values (STUDIO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{s_title}, #{m_pk_writer}, #{s_price}, #{s_location}, #{s_category}, #{s_maximum}, #{s_classstart}, #{s_classend}, #{s_content}, #{s_comment} )
mapper.select: select S.S_PK, S.M_PK_WRITER, S.S_TITLE, S.S_PRICE, S.S_LOCATION, S.S_CATEGORY, S.S_REGDATE, S.S_UPDATEDATE, S.S_MAXIMUM, S.S_CURRENT, S.S_CLASSSTART, S.S_CLASSEND, S.S_READ_COUNT, S.S_CONTENT, S.S_COMMENT, S.S_NAME, M.M_NAME, C.C_CATEGORY, (select count(*) from REVIEW_STUDIO where S.S_PK = #{S_PK} ) as RS_COUNT, (select count(*) from HEART_STUDIO where HS_S_PK = #{S_PK} )as HS_COUNT from STUDIO S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.M_PK_WRITER = M.M_PK JOIN CATEGORYNAME C ON C.C_PK = S.S_CATEGORY where S.S_PK = #{S_PK}
